parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>Arma3dev

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.03

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Groups

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns combat behaviour of unit or group. To set unit or group behaviour see [[setCombatBehaviour]]. The behaviour is one of:
*"CARELESS"
*"SAFE"
*"AWARE"
*"COMBAT"
*"STEALTH"
*"ERROR" - when not available

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>  [[combatBehaviour]] unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - AI unit

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] - unit behaviour, see description 

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value>  [[combatBehaviour]] group

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> group: [[Group]] - AI group

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[String]] - group behaviour, see description  
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>unit1 [[setCombatBehaviour]] "CARELESS";
[[combatBehaviour]] unit1; //"CARELESS"</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>group unit1 [[setCombatBehaviour]] "SAFE";
[[combatBehaviour]] group unit1; //"SAFE"</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setCombatBehaviour]], [[setBehaviour]], [[setBehaviourStrong]], [[setWaypointBehaviour]], [[combatMode]], [[setCombatMode]], [[skill]], [[setSkill]]
</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
